title: Merry Christmas!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Ah, Hanamaru-chan, good morning! Merry Christmas!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Good morning, You-chan. Merry Christmas!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Today’s bring-your-own-stuff Christmas party will be fun. What did you bring?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru brought sweet potato jellies and matcha pudding. How about you, You-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I made lots of Youkisoba! Also, some karaages too-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>That sounds tasty zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hehe. With a sweet dish and a salty dish, it’ll be perfect!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>And with the present exchange, it will get even better! Maru is looking forward to it~. What did you prepare, You-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It would take the fun out if I say it, right. It’s a secret!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You’re right! Maru’s is also a secret!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
